ygData.subject: Re: Disenchanting Melody test results
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Here s another possibility.  The enchanter s pillage enchantment spell reduces the duration of (bad?) spell effects (skunk musk, DoTs, etc.).  Maybe that s
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Brendan wrote:
>
> went with an enchanter friend to the arena last night and tested out the
> effect of Alenia's Disenchanting Melody. since it doesn't cancel magic, it
> seemed likely that it would prevent bad effects (DoT and the like). from
> what i could tell, it didn't do anything at all. he could still charm me,
> and debuffs and DoT worked.
>
> it looks like another broken spell, unless anyone else has seen it
> actually do something?

Here's another possibility. The enchanter's pillage
enchantment spell reduces the duration of (bad?) spell effects
(skunk musk, DoTs, etc.). Maybe that's what this song does?
Should be easy to test in Butcherblock with some skunks.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
